title: Teapot
credit_line: Gift of Susan Pickens in memory of Mary Robb Ballantyne.
provenance_text:
This teapot belonged to five generations of the Robb family born and raised on the Robb Farm, one mile north of McDonald, PA, in Washington County.

Ebenezer Robb (b. 1810), wife: Eliza Wallace
Joseph Wallace Robb (b. 1851), wife: Rachel Lindsey
Mary Robb Douglass Smith, Laura Robb
Mary Robb Douglass Ballantyne (1927 - 1990)
Susan Robb Ballantyne Pickens (b. 1954)
Katie Susan Pickens (b. 1981)



Mary Robb Ballantyne requested 1 week before her death on March 7, 1990 that this teapot be put in a museum.
